classes.description: Represents a chunk of text content for semantic search and retrieval. Linked to Neo4j Chunk node.

properties.name: chunkId
properties.description: Primary key, UUID. Corresponds to chunkId in Neo4j.

properties.name: memoryUnitId
properties.description: UUID of the parent MemoryUnit in Neo4j.

properties.name: userId
properties.description: UUID of the user associated with this chunk.

properties.name: textContent
properties.description: The actual text content of the chunk to be vectorized and searched.

properties.name: sourceUri
properties.description: Optional URI of the original source document.
